title: Swallowed Star - Novel Updates

tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manhua   Alternate World   Apocalypse   Artifacts   Artificial Intelligence   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Clever Protagonist   Clones   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Fast Cultivation   Fast Learner   Futuristic Setting   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Immortals   Inheritance   Insects   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Day   Monsters   Mutated Creatures   Outer Space   Poor to Rich   Post-apocalyptic   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Psychic Powers   Race Change   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   S*aves   Soul Power   Special Abilities   Sudden Strength Gain   Time Skip   Wars   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: I Eat Tomatoes   Wo Chi Xi Hong Shi   我吃西红柿
description: Year 2056, in a city in the Yuan Jiang Su Jin area. On top of a ruined, shattered six story residential apartment sits a teenager wearing a combat vest, militaristic trousers, and alloyed battle boots. On his back is a hexagonal shield and equipped is a blood-shadow battle knife. He sits there silently on the edge of the roof. At this time, the sparkling sky was shining and there was a refreshing breath within the air that blew towards him. However, there was only silence within the ruined, deserted city, with an occasional howl that makes your heart skip a beat.>
